topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0: Enabling Debug Logging

body.p: This topic describes how to enable the EON service for centralized logging, and changing the EON log level to DEBUG.

section.title: To Modify the EON Log Level
section.p: To change the EON log level to DEBUG, do the following:

ol.li: In the logger section: INFO(default), WARN, DEBUG; set it to default, to enable the log.
Edit the DEFAULT section in eon.conf.j2:[DEFAULT] debug = True
Edit the logger_root section in logging.conf.j2:[logger_root] qualname: root handlers: watchedfile, logstash level: DEBUG
Commit your configuration: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor as follows: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;

section.b: To Enable EON Service for Centralized Logging
section.p: To enable EON Service for centralized logging, do the following:

ol.li: Edit the eon-api-clr.yml and eon-conductor-clr.yml files to set the value of centralized_logging to true as shown in the following sample:logr_services: eon-conductor: logging_options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: json files: - /var/log/eon/eon-conductor.log log_rotate: - daily - compress - missingok - notifempty - copytruncate - maxsize 45M - rotate 7 - create 640 eon eon - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: rawjson
Commit your configuration:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;

body.note: To disable the centralized logging, set the value of centralized_logging to False (See Step 2).

section.title: To Modify the OVSVAPP VM Log Level
section.p:
To change the OVSVAPP log level to DEBUG, do the following:
Change the directory to:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible/roles/neutron-common/templates
Edit the logger_root section in ovsvapp-agent-logging.conf.j2:[logger_root] qualname: root handlers: watchedfile, logstash level: DEBUG
Commit your configuration:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;
Run the Neutron reconfigure playbook:cd /home/stack/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible; ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts neutron-reconfigure.yml

p.b: To Enable OVSVAPP Service for Centralized Logging

section.p:
To enable OVSVAPP Service for centralized logging:
Change the directory to:~/helion/my_cloud/config/logging/vars
Edit the neutron-ovsvapp-clr.yml file to set the value of centralized_logging to true as shown in the following sample:logr_services: neutron-ovsvapp: logging_options: - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: json files: - /var/log/neutron/ovsvapp-agent/ovsvapp_agent.log log_rotate: - daily - compress - missingok - notifempty - copytruncate - maxsize 45M - rotate 7 - create 640 eon eon - centralized_logging: enabled: true format: rawjson files: -/var/log/neutron/ovsvapp-agent/ovsvapp_agent-json.log
Commit your configuration:cd ~/helion/hos/ansible git add -A git commit -m "<commit message>"
Run the configuration processor: cd ~/helion/hos/ansible ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost config-processor-run.yml
Prepare your environment for deployment:ansible-playbook -i hosts/localhost ready-deployment.yml;
Run the Neutron reconfigure playbook:cd /home/stack/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible; ansible-playbook -i hosts/verb_hosts neutron-reconfigure.yml --limit NEU-OVSVAPP
To disable the centralized logging, set the value of centralized_logging to False (See Step 2).
